summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting that a subpoena be mailed to UBS. It demonstrates ongoing investigative activity related to financial records in 2020.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, instructing that a subpoena be mailed to UBS.

events.title: Subpoena Issued to UBS
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney requests that a subpoena be mailed to UBS, indicating an ongoing investigation seeking financial records.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: A subpoena was issued to UBS bank on June 29, 2020, as part of the Epstein investigation.
The request was made by an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The document shows continued investigative activity related to financial records years after Epstein's arrest.
